016package io.micronaut.maven.jib;
017
018import com.google.cloud.tools.jib.api.buildplan.*;
019import com.google.cloud.tools.jib.buildplan.UnixPathParser;
020import com.google.cloud.tools.jib.maven.extension.JibMavenPluginExtension;
021import com.google.cloud.tools.jib.maven.extension.MavenData;
022import com.google.cloud.tools.jib.plugins.extension.ExtensionLogger;
023import io.micronaut.maven.core.MicronautRuntime;
024import io.micronaut.maven.services.ApplicationConfigurationService;
025import org.apache.maven.artifact.versioning.ArtifactVersion;
026import org.apache.maven.artifact.versioning.DefaultArtifactVersion;
027
028import java.util.*;
029
030/**
031 * Jib extension to support building Docker images.
032 *
033 * @author Álvaro Sánchez-Mariscal
034 * @since 1.1
035 */
036public class JibMicronautExtension implements JibMavenPluginExtension<Void> {
037
038    public static final String DEFAULT_BASE_IMAGE = "openjdk:17-alpine";
039    private static final String LATEST_TAG = "latest";
040
041    @Override
042    public Optional<Class<Void>> getExtraConfigType() {
043        return Optional.empty();
044    }
045
046    @Override
047    public ContainerBuildPlan extendContainerBuildPlan(ContainerBuildPlan buildPlan, Map<String, String> properties,
048                                                       Optional<Void> extraConfig, MavenData mavenData,
049                                                       ExtensionLogger logger) {
050
051        ContainerBuildPlan.Builder builder = buildPlan.toBuilder();
052        MicronautRuntime runtime = MicronautRuntime.valueOf(mavenData.getMavenProject().getProperties().getProperty(MicronautRuntime.PROPERTY, "none").toUpperCase());
053
054        JibConfigurationService jibConfigurationService = new JibConfigurationService(mavenData.getMavenProject());
055        String from = jibConfigurationService.getFromImage().orElse(DEFAULT_BASE_IMAGE);
056
057        builder.setBaseImage(from);
058
059        ApplicationConfigurationService applicationConfigurationService = new ApplicationConfigurationService(mavenData.getMavenProject());
060        try {
061            int port = Integer.parseInt(applicationConfigurationService.getServerPort());
062            if (port > 0) {
063                logger.log(ExtensionLogger.LogLevel.LIFECYCLE, "Exposing port: " + port);
064                builder.addExposedPort(Port.tcp(port));
065            }
066        } catch (NumberFormatException e) {
067            // ignore, can't automatically expose port
068            logger.log(ExtensionLogger.LogLevel.LIFECYCLE, "Dynamically resolved port present. Ensure the port is correctly exposed in the <container> configuration. See https://github.com/GoogleContainerTools/jib/tree/master/jib-maven-plugin#example for an example.");
069        }
070
071        switch (runtime.getBuildStrategy()) {
072            case ORACLE_FUNCTION -> {
073                List<? extends LayerObject> originalLayers = buildPlan.getLayers();
074                builder.setLayers(Collections.emptyList());
075                for (LayerObject layer : originalLayers) {
076                    builder.addLayer(remapLayer(layer));
077                }
078                List<String> cmd = jibConfigurationService.getArgs();
079                if (cmd.isEmpty()) {
080                    cmd = Collections.singletonList("io.micronaut.oraclecloud.function.http.HttpFunction::handleRequest");
081                }
082                builder.setBaseImage("fnproject/fn-java-fdk:" + determineProjectFnVersion())
083                        .setWorkingDirectory(AbsoluteUnixPath.get(jibConfigurationService.getWorkingDirectory().orElse("/function")))
084                        .setEntrypoint(buildProjectFnEntrypoint())
085                        .setCmd(cmd);
086            }
087            case LAMBDA -> {
088                List<String> entrypoint = buildPlan.getEntrypoint();
089                Objects.requireNonNull(entrypoint).set(entrypoint.size() - 1, "io.micronaut.function.aws.runtime.MicronautLambdaRuntime");
090                builder.setEntrypoint(entrypoint);
091            }
092            default -> {
093                //no op
094            }
095        }
096        return builder.build();
097    }
098
099    public static List<String> buildProjectFnEntrypoint() {
100        List<String> entrypoint = new ArrayList<>(9);
101        entrypoint.add("/usr/java/latest/bin/java");
102        entrypoint.add("java");
103        entrypoint.add("-XX:+UnlockExperimentalVMOptions");
104        entrypoint.add("-XX:+UseCGroupMemoryLimitForHeap");
105        entrypoint.add("-XX:-UsePerfData");
106        entrypoint.add("-XX:MaxRAMFraction=2");
107        entrypoint.add("-XX:+UseSerialGC");
108        entrypoint.add("-Xshare:on");
109        entrypoint.add("-Djava.library.path=/function/runtime/lib");
110        entrypoint.add("-cp");
111        entrypoint.add("/function/app/classes:/function/app/libs/*:/function/app/resources:/function/runtime/*");
112        entrypoint.add("com.fnproject.fn.runtime.EntryPoint");
113        return entrypoint;
114    }
115
116    public static String determineProjectFnVersion() {
117        ArtifactVersion javaVersion = new DefaultArtifactVersion(System.getProperty("java.version"));
118        if (javaVersion.getMajorVersion() >= 17) {
119            return "jre17-latest";
120        } else {
121            return LATEST_TAG;
122        }
123    }
124
125    private LayerObject remapLayer(LayerObject layerObject) {
126        FileEntriesLayer originalLayer = (FileEntriesLayer) layerObject;
127        FileEntriesLayer.Builder builder = FileEntriesLayer.builder().setName(originalLayer.getName());
128        for (FileEntry originalEntry : originalLayer.getEntries()) {
129            builder.addEntry(remapEntry(originalEntry, layerObject.getName()));
130        }
131
132        return builder.build();
133    }
134
135    private FileEntry remapEntry(FileEntry originalEntry, String layerName) {
136        List<String> pathComponents = UnixPathParser.parse(originalEntry.getExtractionPath().toString());
137        AbsoluteUnixPath newPath;
138        if (layerName.contains("dependencies")) {
139            newPath = AbsoluteUnixPath.get("/function/app/libs/" + pathComponents.get(pathComponents.size() - 1));
140        } else {
141            //classes or resources
142            newPath = AbsoluteUnixPath.get("/function" + originalEntry.getExtractionPath());
143        }
144
145        return new FileEntry(originalEntry.getSourceFile(), newPath, originalEntry.getPermissions(),
146                originalEntry.getModificationTime(), originalEntry.getOwnership());
147    }
148
149}
